column1: Smoque BBQ////Food was OK.  My boyfriend loved the brisquet
column2: His ribs were average.  My pulled pork was just OK.  No real complaints about the food
column3: but the atmosphere sucks.  We waited in a long line to eat at a place with as much personality as a Taco Bell.  I'd rather hunt for parking at Smoke Daddy's and have a beer and maybe listen to some music.
